htmlBody: A small presentation note: I think it could be helpful if for the titles of these you copy pasted the show title (and specifically included the number) and also if you linked to the Spotify episode.

Just saw the new post, thanks for updating! 

Another suggestion I'll toss out: it might take a minute, but I'd love to see at least a link post for all the shows and your show notes (and maybe a sequence with all of them organized there by release date). The forum is a place I can go to talk about the show, to rate it even[1], but I've found in most scenarios thusfar when I've wanted to do that that the show doesn't have a corresponding forum post. 

  1. ^

    I'd probably rate things consistently if this were the case, which would give you at least one data point for feedback on the show with greater granularity. For example I had some strong opinions about the Tim LeBon episode, but no where to put them.
